title: A new version of the main inequality and the uniqueness of harmonic maps
abstract: In this paper, we state a new version of an inequality of Reich and Strebel, namely their so-called Main Inequality, and use it to study the uniqueness property of harmonic mappings. To state the main inequality we need the following notation.
note:
© 1999 The Magnes Press.

Received: 12 April 1999; Revised: 01 October 1999.

The authors would like to thank Professors Kurt Strebel
and Edgar Reich for their continuous encouragement and support, and their useful comments concerning this paper.
